name: gitscanner
description: Scan for secrets committed to GIT repositories
author: Jeroen Van Bastelaere

inputs.name: sshEndpoint
inputs.label: SSH endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: SSH endpoint with connection details for the remote machine.

inputs.name: runOptions
inputs.label: Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to whether do a full scan of all commits or only since last commit.

inputs.name: entropyScan
inputs.label: Run high entropy scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this option is selected, the task will also scan for high entropy values. This type of scan runs slower

inputs.name: regexScan
inputs.label: Run a regular expression scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this option is selected, the task will scan for known regular expressions.

inputs.name: failOnStdErr
inputs.label: Fail on STDERR
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this option is selected, the build will fail when the remote commands or script write to STDERR.

messages.UseDefaultPort: Using port 22 which is the default for SSH since no port was specified.
messages.SettingUpSshConnection: Trying to setup SSH connection to %s@%s:%s
messages.ConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to remote machine. Verify the SSH endpoint details. Error: %s.
messages.RemoteCopyFailed: Failed to copy script to remote machine. Error: %s.
messages.RemoteCmdExecutionErr: Command failed with errors on remote machine.
messages.RemoteScriptFileCleanUpFailed: Failed to delete the script file copied to the remote machine. Error = %s.
